name: Car vs City Prototype 0.1
description:
NoteIf the download button is broken I've hosted the download in my Google drive as well! Click here!

This is a very early prototype for a game we are currently working on. We would like as much feedback on the core concept as possible so that we can refine it before moving on with development.

The core concept is a simple one. Drive around and cause as much destruction as possible. Any and all feedback would be appreciated at this stage!

Controls

W A S D Control the cars acceleration, steering and braking.

Left Click anywhere on screen to shoot at that location
